token_info.name: Floating Utopia #3 (2021)
token_info.description: In order to create 3D landscapes, we convert flat images of surfaces and landscapes into a 3D cloud.â€¨ 3D photography is a multi-layer representation of the original flat picture used to synthesize novel views of the same scene. The network generates hallucinated colored point clouds and depth in regions occluded in the original view of the photo.
